Actions.Name: Add Barcode to PDF
Actions.Description: Add a barcode or QR code to your PDF document.

Actions.Description: Convert your HTML file to PDF. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/html-to-pdf/

Actions.Description: Convert your Md file to PDF. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/markdown-to-pdf/

Actions.Description: Convert any type of office documents to PDF format. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/convert-to-pdf/

Actions.Description: Convert your URL file to PDF. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/url-to-pdf/

Actions.Description: Create PdfA document. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/create-pdfa/

Actions.Description: Create thumbnail for the PDF document. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/create-thumbnail/

Actions.Description: Extract the required pages from the PDF document. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/extract-pages/

Actions.Name: Get Document from PDF4me
Actions.Description: Triggers when a document is sent from PDF4me apps.

Actions.Name: Image Stamp on PDF (Preview)
Actions.Description: Add logo image or watermark image to the PDF document. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/image-stamp/

Actions.Name: Merge multiple PDF files into a single PDF file (Preview)
Actions.Description: Merge multiple PDF documents into a single pdf document. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/merge/

Actions.Name: Merge two PDF files one over another as Overlay (Preview)
Actions.Description: Merge two PDF documents one over another as Overlay. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/merge-overlay/

Actions.Name: Optimize Document (Preview)
Actions.Description: Optimize the PDF document. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/compress-pdf/

Actions.Name: Convert PDF to editable PDF using OCR (Preview)
Actions.Description: Create searchable PDF using OCR. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/pdf-ocr/

Actions.Name: Convert PDF to Excel (Preview)
Actions.Description: Create XLSX spreadsheets from PDFs with tabular data. Even from an image you can generate an XLS. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/pdf-to-excel/

Actions.Name: Convert PDF to Word (Preview)
Actions.Description: Transform PDF documents to high quality editable DOCX files. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/pdf-to-word/

Actions.Name: Produce document with dynamic data collection and templates [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Produce your document with dynamic data collection and templates.

Actions.Description: Merge document template with data as json text. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/mail-merge-with-data-string-single/

Actions.Description: Merge document template with data as json text. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/mail-merge-with-data-string-list/

Actions.Name: Mail Merge with Data File (List of Docs) (Preview)
Actions.Description: Merge document template with data from excel or Json file. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/mail-merge-with-data-file-list/

Actions.Name: Mail Merge with Data File (Single Doc) (Preview)
Actions.Description: Merge document template with data from excel or Json file. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/mail-merge-with-data-file-single/

Actions.Name: Protect Document (Preview)
Actions.Description: Protect the document with custom password. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/protect-document/

Actions.Name: Rotate Document (Preview)
Actions.Description: Rotate the pages and in all directions. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/rotate/

Actions.Name: Rotate Page
Actions.Description: Rotate a specific page of a PDF document.

Actions.Name: Split Document by Barcode (Preview)
Actions.Description: Split the PDF document by barcode types and filters. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/split-by-barcode/

Actions.Name: Split Document (Preview)
Actions.Description: Split the PDF document by page number or recurring pages. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/split-pdf/

Actions.Name: Text Stamp on PDF (Preview)
Actions.Description: Add a background watermark text to the PDF document. https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/text-stamp/

Actions.Name: Send Document to PDF4me-Workflow (Preview)
Actions.Description: Start PDF4me-Workflow with document from anywhere https://pdf4me.com/power-automate/documentation/actions/send-document-to-pdf4me-workflow/

Actions.Name: Unlock PDF
Actions.Description: Removes password protection from a PDF file.
